item.title: Search for page with active help
item.description: Type "active link below" (no quotes) in the search field in the help view, and search.

item.title: Select document
item.description: Choose a document titled "Active help" from the search results

item.title: Open link
item.description: Click once "Click here for a Message" link at the bottom of the document.

item.title: Check Results
item.description: Ensure that a "Hello World" is being displayed in a dialog on top of the workbench

item.title: Commands in Help View
item.description: Test command activation from the Help View

subitem.label: Type "Embedding commands" (no quotes) in the search field in the help view, and search.
Choose a document titled "Embedding Commands in Help" from the search results
Click the link for "Open a specific preference page, such as General > Appearance"
Check that the preference dialog opens. Close the preference dialog.

item.title: Commands in Help Browser
item.description: Repeat of the previous test only using the Help Browser instead of the Help View.

subitem.label: Type "Embedding commands" (no quotes) in the search field in the help browser, and search.
Choose a document titled "Embedding Commands in Help" from the search results
Click the link for "Open a specific preference page, such as General > Appearance"
Check that the preference dialog opens. Close the preference dialog.
